title: Qualcomm introduces general-purpose architecture for robotics
description:
Qualcomm said its new architecture supports advanced perception and motion planning with end-to-end AI models.

The post Qualcomm introduces general-purpose architecture for robotics appeared first on The Robot Report.
content:
